King Snake is an upcoming gothic horror film from Jeff Nichols, starring Margaret Qualley and Michael Shannon.
Premise
A young couple encounter problems after they inherit a farm in rural Arkansas.
Cast
* Margaret Qualley
* Michael Shannon
* Drew Starkey
Production
The film is directed by Jeff Nichols. Nichols is also a producer alongside Brian Kavanaugh-Jones and Sarah Green for Tri-State Pictures. The cast is led by Margaret Qualley, Drew Starkey and Michael Shannon.
References
